welcometext.welcome: Welcome to the Murdoch IT Society!
welcometext.desc: We are a student collective formed to pool all our knowledge into one single forum to help better our prospective, current and alumni students. We provide a platform for our students to discuss their work with academic integrity, boost employability and host events.
